channel.title: Shudokan on Meishin Muso Ryu
channel.description: Recent content in Shudokan on Meishin Muso Ryu

item.title: 2019 New York Kendo Shinsa
item.description: Thomas Hill of Shudokan passed his yondan kendo shinsa in New York. Congratulations Tom!

item.title: Shudokan-Ken Wa Kan Monthly Godogeiko for September 2019
item.description: Shudokan and Ken Wa Kan trained together during our monthly godogeiko on Sept. 8, 2019. Shudokan and Shuji Matsushita Sensei hosted this month’s joint practice at our dojo in Stroudsburg, PA. Kendo friends from Virginia and New York joined us as well.

item.title: Shudokan-Ken Wa Kan Monthly Godogeiko for August 2019
item.description: Shudokan and Ken Wa Kan trained together during our monthly godogeiko on Aug. 17, 2019. KWK and Vincent Lan Sensei hosted this month’s joint practice at Marple Newtown Recreation in Newtown, PA.

item.title: 2019 Boston Kendo Shinsa
item.description: Four Shudokan members took the kendo shinsa in Boston on July 28, 2019. All passed. Congratulations!

item.title: 2018 Goyokai Kendo Tournament
item.description: Two members of Shudokan Dojo won bronze medals at this year’s Goyokai Kendo Tournament in Boston.

item.title: Shudokan Kendo Godogeiko 2018
item.description: We hosted our first kendo summer godogeiko ever on Saturday, July 21. Our dojo was lucky enough to train with several high-ranking sensei and their students from several dojos.

item.title: Garden State Kendo Tournament 2018
item.description: We participated Saturday in the 2018 Garden State Kendo Tournament. Every year, this excellent tournament attracts competitors from New York to Canada.
